1.content: Choose a Giantess and settle down. For more info on the story lines see the introduction.
1.title: Main Branch

choices: A popular girl who invokes Dawn's jealousy, Charlotte Andrews
A senior way out of Dawn's 'league', football star Bobby Darren
A boy in Dawn's grade who's tormented Dawn since elementary school, Steve Taylor
11.content: Choose to follow either Dawn or one of her shrunken classmates
11.title: Gigantic Geeks

111.content:
Dawn looks at the square unimaginative building. 100,000 bricks asleep under slanted moonlight, totally unaware of what awaits them on the morrow. From across deserted asphalt, the geek watches as the last light goes out, signaling the retirement of the janitor Mr. Venucio. 'A test subject would be advisable,' her inner scientist assures her, 'just to make sure the ray's still functioning.'

Beneath the woven branches of a manicured bush, Dawn watches as the janitor approaches. He's fiddling in his pockets for the keys to his car. 'Pathetic,' you think, 'half that man's life involves keys, I'm doing him a favor.' When you see his tan uniformed legs passing right outside, you slip out the gun. There isn't any aiming involved at this range, you just point and squeeze. No flash nor beam; its ray is invisible and the plump Italian simply 'vanishes.'
~~~


Venucio stops in mid stride, his foot once poised over a crack, now hangs over a trench. Before he can begin to understand his predicament, his world of twilight gray goes darker. Above, the shadowed visage of a girl, face unclear, ascends into the air like a Goddess of the night. The janitor steps back and nearly stumbles into the 'crack'. When he looks from the mortal fall back around he sees a black shoe raising before him. To his children's shame, he screams like a woman.
~~~


Dawn lifts her loafer over the now penny sized janitor. For a moment a voice of mercy assails her, arguing, 'Mr. Venucio was never mean to you.' She thinks on this a moment before responding outloud, just so her conscience will understand who's the boss, "yeah and he didn't do anything to help either." Only dimly does Dawn register the rodentine squeal as she brings the ball of her foot down on the blue collar worker. A satisfying squish ends his feeble sounds of protest.

You kick the body into a nearby gutter, and leave the blood stain on the cement. They'll just think one of the strays got a bird.

On the other side of the street, you have a primitive camp set up. You curl up there in your 10-degree sleeping bag, the only cold that of the steel ray gun pressed closely against your body. 'Tomorow, tommrow...' The faces of a hundred bullies scroll past your mind's eye as you imagine the varied ways you might destroy them. 'I'll get my revenge on all of you, I'll make you, I'll make you,' you stretch and let loose a yawn begging for sleep,'know how it feels.'
111.title: Just a Test

choices: This is your brain on shrink-ray.
Ignore them, focus on the prize.  You can shrink them after.
1113.content:
You disable the battery powered alarm clock on the second beep and waist no time getting ready. You wear the same get-up as usually: striped polo tee joined with a pair of jeans as over wide in the hips as they are overly narrow at the ankles. Mismatching socks are clearly visible rumpled above your anachronistic foot wear.

You slip your prized ray gun into your pocket and holster your back pack. Usually brimming with books, its now empty except for a roll of duct tape. You'll need all the space you can get in there if things go to plan.

Beyond the treeline the school looks to be functioning as per usual its heady students no doubt unaware of their destiny as her own personal play things. Your research into the gym schedules seems to have paid off -- not so much as a jogger on the athletic fields. The parking lot to is empty as you cross save for a couple of 'stoners' catching a buzz behind then dumpsters.
1113.title: Go-Time

choices: The school shrinks to the size of a 6-pack.
Malfunction!!  The school begins to expand...
11131.content: Dawn zaps them both like the Annie Oakley of shrink. One actually falls onto the still burning roach and bursts into flames. Only a nearby puddle into which he eagerly dives saves him from burning alive. Dawn remembers both of them picking on her in the past so she only laugh at their plight. Just as the burned drugee is raising his head out of the brackish water the dork lowers her foot down on him. Her flat rubber sole is the last thing the stoner sees before being squished into the hard unyielding asphalt. After the scream, the puddle's water turns red around her penny loafer. Anger contained in thick black rimmed glasses, shifts to the second stoner. A fat little sophomore he cries in the face of the towering girl and his own inevitable demise. "Mommy!!" is his last word before Dawn's shoe silences him. She grinds the remains into the black tar with relish, "that's how you always treated me, an insignificant, bug.." The young inventor plays with the dials on the shrink ray adjusting the spray to maximum. "..now you're all going to find out how it feels." As with the janitor, no aiming is required. Dawn just points the gun at the broadside of the building and pulls the trigger, every milisecond laced with anticipation.
11131.title: Your Brain on Shrink

choices: Eager to punish her classmates Dawn takes the building out into the woods.
Wanting privacy Dawn goes to her secret laboratory.
111311.content:
The earth itself rumbles as if angered by the young genius's violation of physics. In truth it is only the vibration of the bedrock as it rips away from the shrinking bulding's foundation. All four brick walls retract toward the school's center of gravity followed by the ceiling. Pipes exposed by the collapse fountain up as the building passes by leaving them cracked and mangled. Dawn watches some curious faces peering with noncomprehending fright through the classroom windows. She waves to them as they shrink along with the building, becoming the size of pool balls and then ping pong balls. Still the school keeps shrinking, the faces disappearing from view entirely hidden both by scale and the rubble left behind by the building's relentless retraction.

At this point Dawn skips out through the devastation dodging upturned debris and growing puddles pumped up by the busted pipes. She has to look around a bit to find her school, but when she does she can't help but laugh. All those years she let her high school intimidate her... Now no bigger than a shoe box, she couldn't believe she'd ever even hesitated at its doors. She covered her mouth in awe over its cuteness as she knelt down before the tiny front face -- then she remembered her duct tape.

Working as busily as a spider at a captured fly she wrapped the building up in layer after layer of impenetrable adhesive. Imagining the plight of her tiny schoolmates inside she smiles as she tilts and turns the school no doubt hurling entire classes back and fourth across their rooms. When every escape route is sealed by that most trustworthy of inventor's tools, she hefts the block into her book bag and zips it up.

In the parking lot Dawn encounters a police car hurtling in, lights flaring. "Are you alright mis..." ZAPPP!!. They shrink to the size of pill bugs, their car a kit-kat. The nerd keeps right on walking making sure to crush both car and cops underfoot -- she doesn't even hear the squish. Strapped over her shoulders is every little brat who was ever nasty to her and now that she's minutes from justice, nothing short of an army could stand in her way.
111311.title: Wrap up a School and Take it Home

1113111.content:
Dawn took a turn up a nearby fire access road, a ribbon of gravel that wound through the rising green. As soon as she had put some distance between herself and the scene of her crime, she cut off into the dense pine forest. Needles sticky with sap dabbed at her cheeks as she passed. Green briar clawed at her jeans.

At the edge of a most encrusted sylvan stone, the scientist unslung her book bag and extracted her prize. There was no way her vengence would wait. Growing the school to the size of a tree stump, Dawn holstered her ray and proceeded to tear off the roof. The students below trapped on all sides by duct tape could only gape up at the pimpled face of their destroyer.

How does Dawn intend to punish them?
1113111.title: Forest of Dark Fate

11131111.content:
Ripping off a huge chunk of roof Dawn saw below an exposed classroom complete with tiny students hiding beneath their desks. She flicked one over to see how big they were and saw to her delight the curvy body of Becky Fergusen, the head of the cheerleading squad. She screamed at the sight of giant Dawn looking at her through glasses bigger than car wind shields. Dawn pinched her between her fingers and brought her up level with her gaze. The head beneath that wavy blond hair was now the size of its brain (in other words a pea).

Becky shrieked movie actress style again as she beheld Dawns monstrous face. "Do you remember what you and your friends put me through last spring. Well now I'm going to return the favor..
11131111.title: Shrunken Cheerleader

choices: Change perspective to someone in the shool
111311111.content:
Slowly Dawn moved the restrained girl toward her mouth and as the nerd's lips parted, her captive began to guess her fate. A piercing shriek came to an abrupt halt as Dawn's hand stopped near the entrance to her mouth. Becky dangled in front of a jet of hot warm breath, catatonic with fear.

Dawn could barely restrain her glee. 'Here's a girl that just yesterday would have thought she was better than me just because she had a more perfect complexion and now she's just an appetizer.' Dawn smiled initiating new screams from the little cheerleader who recoiled at the sight of the steel braces deploying like some cybernetic cage. 'She actually thinks I'd eat her...' the edges of Dawns smile unconsciously hooked up, 'then again why not.' She looks down at the tiny cheer leader in a new light, now as something less then human. 'They all proved that they're less than human by the way they treated me, and its not as if anyone will know... '

Almost without intent, her hand begins moving again slowly passing Becky between her lips. "No! Please, Dawn. Please. I'm sorry; I'm soo sorry!! DAAAWWN!!!" Dawn's lips reduce the pleas to mumbles. She looks down at the classroom and sees that all the students have fled to other less exposed parts of the school. 'Hide all you like,' Dawn thinks as she works Becky around the inside of her mouth. 'You'll all wind up in the same place.' Not giving Becky the justice of a quick death Dawn gulps her victim down, cursing her to a slow gruesome dissolution in her bowls.
111311111.title: Vitamin Cheerleader

111311112.content: ...I have a new job for you Becky. You look to be just the right size for it. You won't be needing these though." Dawn tossed the shrunken cheerleader in her palm and proceeded to undress her. What she couldn't slide off she just tore off the kicking and screaming Becky until she was huddled naked and crying at the center of Dawn's palm. "Oh don't cry, Becky, you have such an important job to do, you're going to be my...
111311112.title: Worse....

choices: Dawn uses her on the other ear
Dawn gets a handful of horny freshmen boys to lick the wax from Brandy
1113111121.content:
..Q-tip. Now straighten up, a good Q-tip needs to be straight." Dawn pulled at her feet and head until she was reasonably so. "Good," she said, lifting Becky up by her feet. Then while dangling her over her ear, she forced the tiny girl head first into its canal. Dawn almost never used Q-tips so she could only imagine the wax she had built up deep in there. Once Brandy was up to her ankle's in Dawn's ear and her screams were amplified by the proximity to Dawn's ear-drum, she began to twist her captive. She gave the tiny body three full turns, wrenching her around by her dainty little feet. As she finished Dawn felt two nearly imperceptible little pops. Based on the amount of wailing inside, Dawn guessed that was her ankles breaking.

Dawn finished by moving Brandy in an out, making sure she was thoroughly polluted with her ear wax. Then finally after four or five thrusts she pulled Brandy out and examined her. The naked girls body was literally yellow with Dawn's ear wax and huge dark clumps of it hung from her body. Masses of the gunk seemed to have been pushed up between her legs. Dawn laughed at the poor girl's predicament. "Oh look Brandy has my ear wax all up in her vag that must feel icky.
1113111121.title: Brandy Becomes a Q-tip

choices: ...licking all my earwax from her body."
11131111212.content:
As Dawn's eyes grope the naked cheerleader's body, sheathed in her earwax, a devilish idea curls the corners of her lips into a fierce smile. Brandy shrinks back from it in her hand, wailing as she wipes the thick yellow resin from her face and eyes. Meanwhile Dawn's attention shifts to the school and her cowering classmates below. With her free hand she pokes around through the paniced student body. Knocking over the biggest jocks as if they were no more than pill bugs, her hand snatches up the nerdiest kids she can find. Wherever acne and glasses converge her fingers come together. One by one she plucks the geeks out of the crowd until she has a small crowd on her palm. Then more gently then she had treated the other students she transfers them into her other palm along with Brandy. The cheerleader suddenly assaulted by the eyes of boys she wouldn't stoop to speak to, hides her nakedness.

"Don't worry, I have nothing against you guys. So I don't intend to torture you. In fact," her giant eyes rolled up to meat brandy's tiny frightened ones, "I have a present for you." She smiled down on what was likely the most sexually frustrated group of boys in her school. "I'm giving you this insect, Brandy to do with what you will." A new set of tiny screams waft up from Brandy as some of the nerds start to stare at her exposed flesh with new found interest. "However, you must show me you appreciate my gift by...
11131111212.title: Allies

choices: Brandy is driven insane and becomes a willing slave
When they're done Dawn commands them to sacrifice Brandy to her.
111311112121.content:
...licking all my earwax from her body." The nerds stand in shocked silence. "Go ahead, she's not going anywhere and if she tries to," Dawn's eyes shift, falling on the quivering cheerleader, "I'll bite her legs off." None of the geeks had moved though some were eyeing Brandy's barely hidden body with increasing interest. "Then again if you don't want my gift I can just eat up all of you." This finally got them moving. A drama began to play out on Dawn's palm right under her eyes. The nerds encircled the girl who'd normally be way out of their league. In response the cheerleader curled up in a ball and began wimpering; she was still covered from head to toe in the thick yellow custard from Dawn's ear. "Go on now, don't be timid, she's my gift to you." One of the nerds, moved by her words, knelt down near the teens dainty feet. Dawn could almost see the internal struggle displayed on his face, his revulsion versus his repressed hormones. The hormones apparently won because he reached in and grappled the girl's feet. She kicked a few times but he managed to wrestle them up to his mouth where he started sucking Dawn's ear wax off her tiny toes and licking it from her soles. He even swiped his tongue in between her toes to get the gunk which had accumulated there. Meanwhile Brandy was a mixture of wails and moans, simultaneously detesting and enjoying the violation.

Emboldened by their fellow, the other dorks now fell upon her like lions on a carcass. The fattest among them licked her cute face all over even going so far as to then thrust his waxy tongue between her lips giving the girl another taste of Dawn's ear. Meanwhile two others shared her arms and split her pert breasts between them. A fourth very nearly dove between her legs. Tearing back the hand which instinctively moved to block him he licked her golden pubes and the inside of her thighs as if they were coated with ice-cream rather than earwax.
111311112121.title: The Violation

11131112.content:
Dawn grins at her screaming, crying schoolmates below, they cringe back at the extent of her bracered teeth, which could easily bite any of them in half. "Oh don't worry, I'm not going to kill you. I want you all to live a long time. You see I want you to know how it feels like to be humiliated day after day after day." Most of the kids had already fled to the schools lower flaws. In response dawn leaned over and started tearing away huge sections of the floor, concrete, insulation wiring and all. Within minutes she had removed most of the first floor's ceiling, leaving the students below no where else to go. Some crawled beneath desks, some cowered in closets but all felt the shadow of Dawn's immense face overhead, the face of the nerdy young girl so many of them had helped torment.

What will Dawn do to them...?
11131112.title: Humiliate them (sexual)

111311121.content: "Don't be so sad everyone," Dawn said mockingly, "we're going to play some games and a gurantee you'll like the rewards. Now this first game is called: eat it. I'm gonna put something in the cafeteria. If you can manage to eat it all up than I'll release two of you. Play well and you may all get free, don't play and well... Its not like Im gonna be giving you anything else to eat." While she was thinking about it, Dawn reached down, flicking several lunch ladies out of her way. Then she proceeded to gut it of all possible edibles. She even tore out the walk-in fridge, which to her wasn't much bigger than a matchbox. "Now we can get to the game, knowing no one will cheat and eat something they're not supposed to. Now remember, whatever I put in the cafeteria is what you have to eat. You can all help, make yourselves a little buffet line if you like. Oh and lets spice things up and say if you aren't done eating in an hour, I will take two of you out, but I wont let you go." After letting her schoolmates absorb this, Dawn began to....
111311121.title: Plays a game

1113111211.content: ...pick her nose. The children looked up in disgusted, horror as Dawn worked her finger deep into her nose. It came out hooked and trailing from it was an enormous booger. She leaned down and wiped it on the cafeteria floor. "Bon apetite."
1113111211.title: ...pick her nose.

choices: The jocks make Tim and the unpopular kids eat it
They round up all the goth and emo kids and make them eat it.
11131112111.content:
Timmy staggered back from it. Other students were beginning to gather around, to stare at it in abject horror. The booger took up half a table. It was greenish yellow and covered in a translucent coating of Dawn's nasal mucus. One freshmen girl fainted at the sight of it. Somewhere else a student started screaming, again. "I am not eating that," spoke a voice next to Tim.

Above, Dawns gargantuan head reared down and all the students cowered beneath her acne pocked face. "Now you'll learn what its like to be humiliated like I was," her voice shook the walls and caused many students to cover their ears, "now best hurry if any of you want to leave this hell and not enter one much worse."

"What could be worse than eating that?" said a sophomore, eyes locked on the five foot long booger.

"Its not that much," Timmy heard himself saying, "if we just all take a bit..."

"Dude did you not hear me?" It was Charlie Forbes, quarterback of the football team. "I am not eating that."

Timmy threw his hands up in the air, "its either eat it or stay here forever, genius."

"She didn't specify who does the eating, Tim-tim."
11131112111.title: Switch to Student Perspective

choices: The Goths continue to eat the booger
Charlie leads a revolution against the jocks
111311121112.content:
Charlie turned to his runningback, Willy Oates, a hulking kid in the shape of a large kitchen appliance. "Get the team together, tell them we're gonna find us some... taste testers."

Tim strode forward fists raised, but some wiser students caught him before he could swing at the jocks, "this isn't right, Charlie and you know it. We all made fun of Dawn and we all deserve to eat it."

"Wrong again Tim-Tim," Charlie mocked, "you see God made a type of people just for such occasion, they're called Emo Kids."

"Don't you mean Jews," Tim mumbled, not recalling that Charlie's girlfriend's last name was Goldman. He only saw the fist for a moment, then everything went black. When he came too, Charlie at first imagined, he was emerging from the most insane nightmare he or anyone had ever had. The booger the size of a rotweiller on the table above, however, quickly sunk that hypothesis. Little had changed except there were now students sitting around the table, pale sad students in black clothing. They were Emo kids and some Goths too, each with the meaty hands of a football jock holding them in their seat. Few would have thought it possible but staring down at the massive wad of encrusted snot which was about to become their meal, they looked even more depressed than usual.

"Ok," Charlie, still the leader of the mob called, "start eating Emo bratz." With shaky hands most picked up the forks they'd been given. The few who refused were soon convinced by a hard cuffs to the head. "The first one to eat, gets an early reprieve."

One brave Goth, a pale fat freshmen named Gary Schneider (Dark Horse to his brothers in moodiness) took the bait and tentatively sunk his fork into the booger, it made a sickening squelching sound which sent shivers down the spines of even the toughest linebackers gathered round. He pulled the fork out carrying a hunk of Dawn's booger and trailing a long line of viscous snot behind. Unable to hold back his tears the boy cried openly as he put the fork and its foul package into his mouth. Far above, the giantess Dawn was looking down with rapt interest. She watched the student's pained expression as he started to chew upon her own booger and smiled as the tiny face distorted in disgust.

The children gathered round heard the grueling crunch of the booger between the boy's teeth and made a collective groan. Charlie, however, was not impressed, "the mucus," he reminded his prisoner and pointed to the rope of Dawn's snot which dangled from the corner of his lips, "don't loose any of that or she might discount the whole thing." New tears streaming down his cheeks, the boy nodded, and sucked up the snot much like a rogue spaghetti noodle. After two tortuous minutes, he managed to swallow the mass of snot and saliva and illicited a cheer from the gathered student body.
111311121112.title: They round up all the goth and emo kids and mak...

choices: "I've got a big one coming up..."
"Lucky you, I think I need to go to the bathroom..."
111311122.content:
Dawn lowered her pants and the students screamed.
She was feeling gassy all morning and now she was going to humiliate those who made her life hell before.

As she turned around and squatted over the roof., students inside began to bang on the walls and get away. *Phhbbhbhhbhbhbfffffff* came the sound from dawn's behind. She wrinkled her nose at the smell then giggled at the suffering of her classmates.

"Hahaha hahaha, there's plenty more where that came from, you're gonna sniff up all my farts you little bugs"
She said, and the students did, they smelled her gas for hours after every fart. She stayed all day just perched above the roof and popping away
Then Dawn said...
111311122.title: Writer's Choice

1113112.content:
You are nothing if not patient, as you bring your sack of victims all the way to your house. They have no idea what he'll awaited them in your basement though, as this was a long time in the making. You walked the full thirty minutes in anticipation of the forecoming events.

You arrived at your home, and greeted your mother, claiming that it was an early release day. She fell for it as you walked to your laboratory in the basement. You lock the door with three locks as you descend the stairs to the main room. Here, you set your bag down and take the school out, placing it on the table in the middle of the room.

You tear off the roof, and smile at your property, wiggling your finger on the second floor. They screamed in terror, but you just laughed at the misery, and decided to
1113112.title: Wanting privacy Dawn goes to her secret laborat...

choices: Dawn pulls out her shrink ray and zaps Bobby in the back!
Dawn decides to shrink the entire Stadium along with Bobby!
Dawn holds off until the championship game, then shrinks Bobby on the field!
113.content:
Bobby wiped the sweat from his brow as he gulped down the ice-cold Gatorade. He had once again led his High School team to victory, and would only need to do so one more time to make his school the state champions. This game was on home turf, and many of his school's students and faculty members were there, cheering him on. Bobby was covered with sweat and dirt from the game, and was on his way to the showers when a petite dorky looking girl with thick glasses approached him.

"Hi, Bobby! That was some game today!" the girl said, pushing the thick glasses up her nose.

"Yeah." Bobby replied, without much thought. He didn't know this girl, and didn't really want to. She was just some Nerdy Freshman, and way beneath him. Not to mention the fact he was already dating Heather, the head cheerleader and undeniably the hottest and most popular girl in the school. Bobby started to walk by, but the dorky girl seemed to have other plans. She grabbed his arm and told him she was his biggest fan, and would like to have coffee or something with him.

"Let me go, loser!" Bobby bellowed as he broke free of the obsessive girl's grasp.

Dawn (the nerdy girl) fought back tears as the object of her obsession walked by. "I'll have you yet, Bobby Darren!" she muttered softly.
113.title: A senior way out of Dawn's 'league'...

choices: Dawn hides the quarterback in her bookbag
Dawn decides she wants him a little smaller
He's so cute Dawn can't resist giving him a kiss
1131.content:
Dawn fondles the sleek casing of the gun in her pocket. 'I needed to test it anyway..,' she thought, 'and now's as good a time as ever.' With no one around to see, she pulled out the weapon which was tipped with a crystal shaft, like a wand of some sort. Pushing a button on the handle, she zapped Bobby in the back with a ray of light.

**************

At first Bobby thought he had tripped and fallen, then he realized he was still standing and yet everything around him was getting taller. He felt his jersey loosening around him and his pads slipping from his dwindling muscles. "What's happening?!" he heard his own voice squeek like a preadolescent. Then a second later, Bobby's head submerged under the neckline of his shirt and he found himself struggling in the darkness with his own clothes. Then came the foot steps, literally shaking the ground beneath him. He imagined a passer by and screamed, "hey I'm under here, let me out." As the footsteps grew even louder he braced himself preparing to be stepped on, but suddenly they stopped. A moment later a wash of light blinded Bobby as his jersey was pulled back. He blinked up into the giant, acne-pocked face of the girl whom he'd just given the brush off. Instinctively he scrambled backward, the size of her face meant he was no bigger than a mouse. Before he could escape however titanic fingers with chipped nail polish curled about him, siezing him with rib cracking force.
1131.title: Sports Collectables

choices: Bobby pulls himself together and makes plans for an escape.
Bobby makes the decision to try and please the giant dork.
11311.content: "Pleeease Heelp me!" Bobby squeals pathetically as Dawn lifts him into the air. Her cracked lips badly in need of chapstick smile. Her voice, loud as a rock concert assaults Bobby's tiny ears, "Now your mine forever." The words melt the boy's courage and he begins to cry, "Please Turn me back, Dawn, I...I....I promise I'll go out with you." Dawn's eyes magnified behind her thick glasses see right through the boy's feigned offers. "Oh no, my little pet, your mine now and nothing you can say will change it." And with that she dropped him into an open pocket in her book bag. Bobby fell roughly into a pile of pens and pencils. He tries to scramble toward the light but a giant zipper seals the pouch and his fate. In the darkness with only the company of oversized stationary, the boy once the toughest kid on the squad, weeps into his hands.
11311.title: Dawn hides the quarterback in her bookbag

12.content: Choose your position in the city/hive.
12.title: Miniature Destinies

choices: You fall asleep and the crew leaves without you.
You manage nap but remain awake.
While you're asleep the caravan is attacked.
121.content:
"Clem... Clem!!" You start forward almost bashing your brains out over the steering column. Dazed by sleep the first thing you remember is your doughnut. You're munching it when the foreman hurls the tiny compartment door open and thrusts his stubbled face inside. With helmet, goggles, and radio antennae fused into a single unit he looked a little bit like an insect above the chin. "Clem," the human section of his face shouts, "you've got just one job in this lot and that is to pull that gracked lever when we load up the crate." The taught man glances down to your protruding belly, the crest of which swells around the afore mentioned stick. "What's a matter, gut's in the way?..." You look down at the crumb strewn surface considering. "PULL THE STICK, BOY!!"

The foreman's yell slaps the doughnut out of your hand and you immediately yank on the lever. Theres nothing else after that, only to watch the machine do its precise automated dance. Outside a robotic crane hoists the hexagonal crate and fits it amongst others on the caravan like one more 10,000 pound piece in an endless puzzle. Nine trucks in total fume while they wait in front of this one and all but the current have their honey comb loads hidden by rain proof tarps. You note the driving teams assembling by the massive tires meaning the day was drawing to a close, and more importantly meaning dinner, soon enough.

"Good job, chunk." The foreman slaps you on the back, and you cough bits of pastry. "Just like a pro," he laughs as he closes the door on you. Once again you're left waiting in the cramped glass container positioned to see the next crate being slowly loaded below. As you watch your leaner coworkers go about their mindless tasks your eyes start to feel heavy. 'I won't fall asleep this time,' you tell yourself as you lean your head back against your vinyl seat's exposed foam.
121.title: Clem, Master of the Stick

choices: Get into a dump truck and drive like hell.
Grow a conscience and try to rescue some of your under-age workers.
122.content:
“Almost.. there...” You watch the long ladder swing round. Lines of helmeted workers stand poised up and down its length, buckets and shovels in hand, all waiting for a chance at the prize.

The jar is a mountain, but what drips down its side is neither lava nor mudslide but gold, liquid gold. The junior workers clumsily mine what has pooled on the ground as a fleet of loading trucks back into view. All is quiet save for the 'beep beep beep' of their safety meters as you watch the ladder touch home on a gooey ledge far above. Beyond lay a sea of honey, sweet for the taking, enough to make your multi-million dollar cooperation into a multi-trillion dollar cooperation. But, reasons are many why other entrepreneurs hadn't attempted the gamble before. One chief amongst them is that none of them are as crazy as you, Adrion Moxley.

You started out as a small time hustler, women, gambling, drugs (even cane sugar), anything that seemed hot at the time. By the time you made your first mill the heat was on you like a giant's oven. You decided to go legit, and let your wife think it was her ceaseless whining that won you over, 'the stupid bitch.' When you were still a brat you dreamed about one day being a scavenger. You'd even read some books, Adventures in Cabinet Climbing by Lawrence Gillinger, My Time Amongst the Giants by Tommy Schull. It seemed like an exciting life and one that, like the hustle, could pay off big to someone with the required wits. So you bought the fleet, the crane, and hired your first crew. On their next pay check you go bankrupt. 'But that's no worry anymore,' you uses binoculars to watch the first shovel strike nectar. You bite your lip in anticipation. For anxiety's sake you turn your scope on the spotters camped out on the far cliff. Knowing they also watch you, you give a wave. A moment passes like a truck in low gear and then a white flag goes up. You hide your sigh of relief from the nearby workers. The chumps actually believed your hype about knowing the Therians' routines. It was the only way, really. If you'd run with the truth you'd never have been able to afford a crew big enough to gather the stash quickly: 'which is the real key to foiling the giants.'

You're watching the first ceremonial bucket traverse the ladder hand to hand, when a tremor throws the current tender and his precious load into the air. His blood curdling scream reaches even his employer's ears far below. You shift your scope around looking for the source. It couldn't be the Therians, the spotters had an eagle eye on the kitchen...'or did they,' a very real tremor shakes the ground and Adrion sees the ladder start to teeter. Workers hang to it for dear life like fleas to a hair in the wind. A wave of fleeing trucks and personnel pulls your scoped eye down to the source of all this chaos. Where your $400,000 crane once stood there is now only a paw with the arm of the device, the only unsmashed section, extending out between the toes.

The scope falls from your hands. The shattering of its lenses is a distant chime. At the corner of your vision you barely see the spotters madly waving their red flag. The twisting shearing sound of snapping metal spiced with screams is all you hear. All you see is the scaling ladder and its hundreds of ill fated workmen carried up and up past curving heights of gray fur. Paws provide the lift, their grip smashing many men into pulp in the process. Some throw themselves into the void rather than meet whatever awaits above – they are the lucky ones. Your eyes only break from the scene to follow these unfortunate few as they fall screaming to their deaths.

Now you see its...her face... 'a Mouse?' You'd spent all your time worrying about the home owners forgetting that they had other parasites beyond man. 'But in all those books they never mentioned carnivorous rats?' As the female Mouse looks the ladder of hanging workers up in down, there's no doubt what's going through her Animal mind.

Forcing your vision to pan out from the doomed men, you take in the whole mayhem that surrounds you. The first thing you notice is – she is not alone. Screams from over your shoulder spin you around in time to see a paw crush two of your loading trucks at once. Toes and claws wrinkle around the remains obliterating one survivor wriggling toward escape. The Mouse snatches another vehicle up in his forepaw playing at its roof with a claw in an attempt to get at the juicy and no doubt terrified insides.

Near the base of the bowl the junior employees, many of them underage workers (teenagers and younger with badly forged paperwork), stand quaking in their boots. A rumble announces the approach of yet another giant and a big eared shadow confirms its species. You blare at them through the megaphone, “for God's sake get the Hell out of there!!” Nothing moves them, however, until the source of the shadow, a young girl mouse steps out into view. Her green eyes, lay claim to them all like a wolf surveying a herd of lambs. Terror stricken, the rookies run according to their instincts, away from Her, but towards the honey. Most wind up stuck and immobilized, a kicking screaming mass of arms and legs immersed in sucrose. The Mouse with her hair done up in a pony tail and a checkered dress down to her knobby knees, looks almost like one of your daughters. When she bends down over the young men and boys giggling the resemblance becomes disturbing – 'it could be Betty playing with some toys she found..except for the ears, and whiskers... and tail.' The face she makes when she licks her lips, however, is decidedly not human. The only time you'd ever seen your daughter make a face like that was maybe... before desert.

A new round of screams from on high pulls your eyes up against your will. There the first Mouse runs her red tongue along the ladder licking up multitudes as others fall, some by their own choice. Her saliva sheathed muscle is nearly coated in a second layer of writhing workmen when she retracts it. As they disappear into the void between her fangs, their screams reach their zenith. Surely all are wishing they'd thrown themselves to their deaths when they had the chance.

You watch transfixed as the giant Mouse chews. You can no longer hear their screams but you can imagine their plight, tossed about in a dark cave full of mashing and slashing rocks. Any who managed to dodge those horrible teeth would only wind up mashed into a ball of his ground up comrades and the Mouse's spit, waiting to meet a much worser and slower death in her stomach. You succeed in turning away only after she swallows. On the opposite side of the jar the Mouse which could be the other's younger sister, licks up both men and honey at once, laying upon her chest and swaying her legs in leisure as she does. Behind you, the male Mouse who sports a round belly of gray fur, is adding to it. He up-ends one of your fleet trucks over his mouth, one he's sliced open like a tin can and dumps dozens of survivors down his gullet. You decide it's time to get out of here.
122.title: Sweet Hustle

choices: Try to maneuver the big Mouse blocking the way.
Drive over the edge... are you crazy?!
1221.content: Coming at you with all the intertia of a steam train is your only chance. No bother in waving, boss or no, its driver isn't gonna stop for a thing, not with giants in both the rear and side view mirrors. Instead a hand disappears into the hustler's jacket, and comes out with a revolver. The noise of the shots can not begin to compare with that of the rampage sounding from all sides. You don't stop pulling the trigger until you see the red splatter against the wind shield. Before the truck coasts to a stop you've tossed out the stiff and are sitting in a puddle of brains. Without thinking of the gore soaking into your 500 cubit slacks, you gun the engine.
1221.title: Stakes is High

choices: Gun it and stick to the lights.
'He's going to catch me, I have to break trail.'
12211.content:
A crane of your head shows you more than you want. The first mouse is sucking the last of the struggling workers off the ladder while her younger (sister?) is licking up the remainders of your underage work force. You manage to banish the scene from your mind, but the sight of them chewing up people you'd known conjures imaginary screams more difficult to put from your mind. They echoe through everything, as you dance the transmission up through its gears and aim for the clearest route round the rodents' 'big brother'.

Not entirely clear; on the way you're forced to run over three of your workers who won't get out of your way. The fools actually tried to wave you to a stop. 'As if they would have stopped,' you consider, mind going temporarily to your bloody trousers. 'Survival is paramount,' you repeat the Abbatwa maxim from childhood memory and run over a fourth, this one just because he was in the way. By the time the second wheel has popped over the shallow hump of his shattered spine, the Mouse is almost within tail's reach.

Unfortunately the fat rodent takes to your speeding dump truck like a kitten to a speeding slinky. Carelessly he drops the truck he was holding almost forgetting to chew the workers who still struggled between his teeth. Without wasting time to swallow, he sprints in your direction, paws igniting tremors at each fall. You spin the wheel, cutting a corner, but sticking close to the trail. Never do you take your eyes off the line of lights, red and blue, that lead home.
12211.title: Blue and Red Bread Crumbs

134.content:
The incendiary rush of the incoming atmosphere ripped at the melting wings of the space ship. One, two and three, every fin pulled free spiraling out into the stratosphere like lost boomerangs. The main craft like a molten drop of steel flung at high speeds, torpedoes down toward a lush green continent. Then as the flames along its fuselage creep toward the cockpit, a fiery explosion and out of it jets a round escape pod. Once free of the blast parachutes jet from hidden compartments. Light as a ping pong ball over a campfire, the pod floats down to... earth?

A decaying city spire pierces the green like a rotting iron phallus. Its long shattered windows gape like a matrix of screaming mouths, opening to a cavity that is little more than clogged scaffolding. At the mercy of the wind's whim, the vessel...
134.title: 'Landing'

1343.content:
When the pod rocks to a sudden and quite unexpected stop you share a look with your copilot. It took some measure of force to turn your head against the seat's constricting padding, but you finally managed the angle it takes to meet Janice's eyes. "Something's wrong," you voice what you see in her exalted expression. "The altimeter still reads us as 35 meters."

"It's laser based, it can't be wrong, unless..." Dr. Betty Conchlin, the science officer, unstraps herself and stand up to her full height dwarfing her male crew members still contained in their child sized seats. "Hey," you cry, "I didn't give the order to unfasten, stay in your seat until..." "We're stuck on something."

'What insubordination,' you think, appalled at the core of your military bearing. 'Was stature truly so important, his height in no way affected his rank.' "Report, Doctor." You decide to bring up the matter when everyones lives aren't hanging...

"Oh my God, we're hanging from a building." 'Dramatic, but to the point.' Janice unstraps and gets up before you can order her to stop and the entire craft shifts under her 'giantess' weight. Everyone flinches as the pod sways like an unsteady pendulum.
1343.title: Doom

choices: Attend to your crew and deal with the Doctor later.
13431.content:
Quiet swells in the swaying pod until it's about to burst like a metal pimple. Then suddenly -- 'SNAP.' Free fall wrests both unseated women up into the air where they hover like genies. The men cringe, belts digging into their skin as they to are hoisted upward. The mortal stop makes all into chaos, a blur of motion and pain that leaves non conscious.

You're the first to come too and the first thing you realize is that you can't breath. Two soft objects, like leather clad pillows are suffocating you from either side. A strain of your eyeballs allows peeking over the obstructions. You're greeted with a familiar slender neck and above, spiked yellow hair -- Betty. The craft, your realize must have fallen on its side with your science officer thrown ontop of you. How embarrassing, at your size she's liable to smother you like an infant.

Urgently you work your hands beneath her weight searching for your strap fastener. Above you twist and shout against your otherwise pleasant confines. "Get off me you dike!" you yell, your words instantly absorbed by her cleavage. Still as if she somehow heard through the vibrations in her flesh she stirs and rises a bit on her arms. Blessed air flows down into the opening space between your face and her massive boobs. "Dr. Conchlin for God's sake stay where you are," the words take off from your mouth faster than a squadron of jets at Def Con 5.

Her face looks like some inquisitive bird as its cocks down in your direction. Features, just a tad to angular to be beautiful, start with a slightly slanted forehead and end with a sexy beak of a nose. Oiled, spiked and pruned, her hair is a coating of feathers. Only her human ornaments, the slender spectacles and barely obvious nose ring mar her animal nature. You're speechless for a moment, not just from her exotic and attractive features, but their sheer size. If birds had ever decided to evolve back into dinosaurs, the missing links might bear resemblance to Dr. Conchlin.

"Captain... I... I'm very sorry..." As her eyes glide down you and she realizes how fully she has you trapped, a disturbing (mutinous even) grin appears on her face. You've never seen her, or any woman for that matter, look at you as she does then - like a chicken eying a worm. "Be honest, Captain, you liked it didn't you."

Before you can respond, the dike brings her beasts down on you again and the soft mounds easily envelop your head. You can hear her muffled laughter outside as she presses her boobs together literally sandwiching your little head between them. You yell every manner of reprimand but they're all lost in her gelatinous contours. Dr. Conchlin had always been so tight laced and reserved -- 'maybe its an atmo problem (too much oxygen...?)'

The breasts of your science officer finally release your face hot and sticky from its confinement. The women who you always had pinned for a prudish intellectual, begins buttoning her uniform as if nothing had happened. She preens her hair a bit with careful fingers and then pats you lovingly (or derisively) on the head. "Now we'll just keep that bit of fun between you and me. Don't want little Ben being jealous, do we. " You're head is still spinning from that 'bit of fun' and you can hear another of your shipmates groaning in the background.

Jenna was a sixteen year old girl, yet she was also paradise and god to millions of microbial people.

Invisible cities dotted her cheeks, temples built upon her mountain-like freckles. Her nose stood over the settlements like an infinite peak, her nostrils sending unforgiving winds in and out every few seconds.

Just out of the influence of the winds, a titanic sinkhole is carved into the ground, spongier red earth around the endless void. Around the sinkhole are numerous other settlements, lots of available space dedicated to worship of their wonderful world-god.

--------------------------------------------

Jenna gazed lazily at her reflection in the mirror, utterly unaware of the millions that called her face home.

145.content:
Massan is a Holy Kingdome devoted to the service of the Goddess Charu whom they live upon and gain sustenance from. The castes are, according to the Betas (ancient scriptures), handeed down originally from the Goddess herself to establish order and defeat chaos.

Brahmins -- You are of the priestly class, one of the few allowed beyond the great forest.. You conduct the age old rites of veneration for the Goddess Charu, held at the holiest temple built just north of the woman's vagina. Even you, however, have never visited the holiest of holies to the south.

Kshatriyas --You are of the warrior class. Your job is to fend off the many external parasites that share Charu's body as well as protect the holy lands from barbarians who live across the tan wastes (in otherwords beyond her pubic region). Some warriors are dispatched to fight in far off lands of Charu to protect the distant trading interests of the holy land.

Vaishyas -- You are a craftsmen. Your raw materials are pubes, sloughed skin, lint; as well as exotic materials that comes from colonies across the wastes, an adhesive substance calle Do-Jam, a rubbery substance called Vroogers among other wonders. Somehow you manage to forge combinations of these into useful items, even simple machines.

Shudras --You are a member of the lower class, a resource collector. You currently work as a sawyer in the great forest, but you may be sent elsewhere if your liege commands. Your job is back breaking and the the work never ends. Add to this the danger of the Krabdrel, horrid giant crustaceanas that stalk through the thickest woods, and you have a life the envy of no one save...

Untouchables -- You are one of those cursed to work to the far south, driven there either by debt or enslavement. In a land that is said to be beyond the sight of Charu, at the center of a deep ravine, lies a swamp surrounded by a forest like the holy land to the north. However, there's nothing Holy about Yama. It is a place a torture where you'll spend the rest of your days picking gunda, a precious livestock feed, from the foul trenches in the swamp.

154.content:
The Town of Littlefork in southern Omaha is sleeping soundly. Citizens forget about the state of the world, the fall of the US from world dominance and its ever plummeting economy as they slip into sweet dreams. No doubt many visit in their nighttime wanderings the fairy tale world long ago when American flags flapped all across the globe and the West's interests guided global trade. Much unlike the world today where the vast majority of the US military has been miniturized and resold as toys to Japanese school kids.

You are Steve Harwitz, seventeen year old local good'ole boy, and you're not asleep, not yet anyway. You place another empty beer on the hood of your truck and after a quick tally of its blurry companions you calculate it'll take at least another six pack to knock you out cold. You crack open a cheap watery beer and raise it in salute to the faded American flag hanging over your yard, 'still the greatest nation in the world.' But as soon as you speak the words your memory conjures images from the last decades that defeat all your faith. It seemed like every moment of America's humiliating defeat was forever preserved by that evil tentacled brain: the internet. You chug your beer flushing the images away with alcohol.

Slamming it down, you reach for another when a red light illuminates the sky. You feel yourself rolling off your pick-up, but before you hit the turf, you've already passed out. Your last thought is of one of the images you tried so hard to forget: the famous video of the Washington Monument being miniaturized. You remember the sculpture shrinking like a dick in cold water and above it a red light...
154.title: The Beggining of the End

Wide awake in a compact enclosure along with who knows how many stripped and bound prisoners, you finally add your voice to the chorus of flesh muffled screams. A high pitched yell ascends past your own and you remember your hands. Immediately you relax your grip on the stranger's breasts. When you do, you're all the more desperate to pull out -- 'what if she recognizes me. I'd never live this down', but that's when it his you -- live. You're not going to live through this. 154312.content:
Hikaru slides the lid from the top of her bento box prompting a fresh a waft of steam to drift up from her gaijin. 'Wet dog?' "Waitress, there's something wrong with my food." The smartly dressed young server sweeps a tray with two more lunch boxes onto a table infront of her and strides over. Her trained nose hovers over the struggling little people taking a delicate sampling of their lingering odor. "they smell like wet dog. There must be something wrong."

The waitress smiles politely not wishing to dishonor her customer by implying her igonrence. None the less she corrects her, "this is the way gaijin smell unless they're fried. If this is your first time trying them, don't worry the taste is a far different flavor. Much spicier."

Hikaru stabs her chopsticks down into the box. The pinching tips come up with one of the single rolls, a young boy bound tightly to a bed of rice by sea weed. She looks him over for a moment, notes he's not too much older than her own brother, and then pops him in between her lips. Afraid the outside of him might taste the same as he smells she quickly brings down her teeth releasing a flood of very different flavor into her mouth. A faint smile registers on her face as she chews the gaijin's inards up with the rice. The waitress noting her approval glides off to some other task.
154312.title: Wet Dog

1543122.content:
You can't see much from the slim cracks between the shifting bodies, but you hear the screams and you see the giantess, her beautiful mouth working at grinding something. Some of the couples blocking the view shriek as well no doubt at what they're seeing above. 'I can't be here, this can't be happening.' Denial has you testing your bonds once more, but your wrenching only serves to hurt Stacy and doesn't even stretch the bands of seaweed that bind you and her together. You rear back planting your head in the plump buttocks pressing in from above and suddenly they're gone. When you look around you see a fat couple lifting off into the air, propelled by two bamboo shafts.

The Asian girl who dominates the sky inspects her next morsel with a sort of smug satisfaction. Terrified between her chopsticks the middle aged couple cry and plead for their meager lives. The rest of you watch in spell bound silence as your owner licks her lips, taste buds only stimulated by their terror. She speaks to them in some 'chink' language you can't understand and don't want to you -- it sounds sweet but you're willing to bet the underlying meaning isn't.' Slowly she angles her sticks toward her parting young lips, her smile promising pain beyond imagining.

Her silken mouth closes on her chop sticks and she slides them free absent their American captives. For a moment she tosses them about in her mouth, as one might with a rock candy or other succulant sweet. She giggles, perhaps at some hidden drama occurring upon her tongue, then she starts chewing. You can hear screams of renewed terror and unbelievable torment escape through her cheeks. 'My God, she's chewin' them two up like they were no more thana' paira' corn fritters...' The delayed realization hits you like an automobile wreck recalled by an amnesiac, 'in a matter of bites that's gonna be me.' Maddened, you start pulling to free yourself despite Stacy's cries of protest. Everywhere around you in the hellish dish of flesh you see men doing the same.
1543122.title: Japan's Cure for Obesity

15431222.content:
When the seaweed binding gives no evidence of breaking, you look around with dread, part of your mind having now accepted your fate. What you see, however, prompts a whole new round of struggling and cries from Stacy as you inadvertently fuck her tight vagina in the process.

Stabbing down from above are the two chpsticks. They land like fallen trees on either side, forcing you to conclude the inevitable -- you're next. Then the 'trunks' clamp together driving all thoughts from your brain by sheer pressure. Stacy's squealing accompanies your crying as you both ascend to your mutual doom. Below, you see the entire tray for the first time, its chambers populated by your kin and neighbors all prepared as delicacies for this Asiatic Giantess. A turn of the chopsticks radically alters your view, however, and you're now staring at a hundred foot high wall of hungry exotic beauty. As before, she licks her lips exposing a tongue your superior in both size and strength.
~~~

Hikaru inspects her next bite. Even the young ones are overweight, 'is all they eat hamburger?' The tiny faces, pictures of absolute terror, make her tummy groan and she wastes no time popping them in her mouth. Silken lips shut off their screams and slide them both off the chopsticks and onto her tongue. Deciding this couple tastes a bit less like wet dog, she decides to suck on them for a bit, her tongue having her way with the bound Americans who are now no more than another snack.
~~~

Your scream and Stacy's blend together as you are thrown back and fourth inside the sweet sticky cavern of this beauty's mouth. Saliva coats you both in seconds, a symbol of the fact that you now belong to her and are soon to become part of her. The tongue catches you both in its smooth shallow fold and then raises you up against a ridged pallet. It then grinds you both back and fourth until you're sure your skin's about to rip free of your skeleton.
~~~

Recalling that she has a whole tray to finish, Hikaru tongues the couple over to the back corner of her mouth -- beneath her mashing molars. She brings her teeth down on their naked, unprotected bodies relishing the squirming sensations that resonate faintly through her teeth. Then she ends it.
~~~

"Please God, oh please no, God," you hear Stacy whimpering as jagged walls of dentine compress you both. Knowing this is your last moment alive, you do the only thing a man like you can think to do. You start humping the girl below you, turning her words into squeals of surprise. Furiously, intent to have one last orgasm, you thrust into her helped by the hard bed of molars underneath. Above, the top row presses down harder pushing you further into Stacy's tight slit. By the time your ribs start cracking you're deeper in a girl than you have ever been. Somehow the thought of being naught but a morsel in a Japanese woman's mouth has made you harder and longer than ever. You're literally in her uterus and Stacy is howling, whether in pain or pleasure you don't know. When the teeth finally clamp down, you bust your load at the same moment spraying semen as the force of the bite simultaneously sprays your guts. Stacy comes as well, quivering uncontrollably as the diner's teeth maul her beyond recognition.
~~~

Hikaru chews the couple quickly but thoroughly and after a barely noticeable gulp she goes for her next struggling bite.
15431222.title: Pleasure and Pain

info.brief_description: Explores five different shrunken societies and the lives of those within
info.description:
This interactive is about being a citizen or member of a society at the mercy of giants. These may be simple giants and giantesses or true Titans depending on which storyline you follow. No rules, just have fun and try to stick to the theme of the storyline. A summation of the five main options below.

The Mini Societies

Home Schooled -- Dawn Silverman, a 14 yr old nerd who's tired of being picked on at school decides to use her science genius to shrink her entire school. Follow either Dawn, the popular boy she's crushing on (literally), a popular girl she's jealous of, or the boy who's been humiliating her since 1st grade (uh oh).

Ant-Men -- In an African landscape populated by titanic anthropomorhic animals, the Abbatwa, or Ant-Men are a plague to all living things. A mirror of our own culture along with all its bureaucracy, technology, and greed, their lighted cities are still seen as little more than glowing bug hives by the 'primitive' but God-like Animals that rule the world. Once threatening to deforest all of the jungle and wither the savanna, the Abbatwa, after being exterminated in the billions, are now little more than a pest. Any African animals are fair game as far as giants go, as well as, of course, gender.

Man's Rightful Place -- A disease afflicts the earth, a virus that alters the Y chromosome. The effect is only visible to the offspring, so before the mutation can be traced back to the cause, all the men on earth outside of isolated tribal cultures are mutated by the virus. Those men born with the defect never advance past their childhood height. In just a few generations the culture of earth is turned on its head with women towering over men. In the advanced future, men become slaves and breeding stock, owned by their female masters like animals. They loose even more height, averaging now at 2.5 feet; they also loose the ability to speak to even voice their objections. Thankfully most don't have any for sexual selection has favored macrophilia over the centuries, breeding a race of men who actually live to lick the feet of their female owners.

Inspired by the Giantess Amy Interactive: http://www.writing.com/main/portfolio.php?action=edit&item_id=1526652

Gaia -- Your city is not below a Goddess but upon her -- she is neither monster nor deity but the entire world. For eons your industries have harvested the resources of her body while simultanteously cleaning her. The old religion claims that your people exist in a symbiosis with this cosmic beauty, but she is so large and so truly unaware of your presence that some scientists among you contend that she is not even alive but rather geologic in nature. This leads to the major schism in your society: whether or not to tap the rich region of resources lying beneath the skin (or 'mantle' as the scientists would call it)

Japan's Destiny -- Japan ascended to dominance in the mid 21st century by being the first nation to develop shrinking technology. Now in the 22nd century the Asian nations rule the world as the West did once long ago. Gaijin are considered less than human and are used both as food and as an ingredient in Chinese 'Traditional' Medicine. Microphilia, at least in Japan, has become a mainstream trend and no school girl is happy without at least a few pet Americans. In fact the demand for gaijin is so high that many western nations find themselves swearing over entire towns to clear their national debt, a debt accrued in their unsuccessful war against the Asian League. The luckiest of these become the pets of the Japanese elite, rich businesswomen, divas and spoiled brats who can afford to keep entire populations captive, while most go to supply Asia's growing demand for raw gaijin. Some common modes of preparation are linked below:
http://www.bekkoame.ne.jp/~kobatan03/jpeg/7014.jpeg
http://www.bekkoame.ne.jp/~kobatan03/jpeg/7131.jpeg
http://www.bekkoame.ne.jp/~kobatan03/
